name: San Francisco Area of Narcotics Anonymous
description: The San Francisco Area of Narcotics Anonymous (SFNA) is a nonprofit fellowship or society of men and women for whom drugs had become a major problem. SFNA members help each live drug-free through the Narcotics Anonymous program.
fullDescription: The San Francisco Area of Narcotics Anonymous (SFNA) is a nonprofit fellowship or society of men and women for whom drugs had become a major problem. SFNA members help each live drug-free through the Narcotics Anonymous program.
